KitKat::

She growled at him. "Should I have chose  to kill you,  you would be 
dead by now." She snarled at him one more time, then went through the 
door. This was a bot whom she would be wary of from now on.  She felt 
something in her spark for this one. And that would be dangerous for 
her. She had lived her life for the predacons, and all it gave her 
was a grave to rest in. Now, all that her life ment was to eradicate 
the maximals at any cost. Yet, for all her anger, she felt something 
for this bot who had the nerve to hit her. Something,  she couldn't 
explain.  She told herself that it was nothing and walked out of the 
room.

She made her way back to the entrance and thought of Carnatron's 
message. She opened a channel to him. "I am at the entrance. If you 
wish to speak to me, please meet me at the entrance of the base."

And yet, her thoughts returned to SharpClaw.




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : SharpClaw : :
> He chuckled at the femme, as he turned and moved towards the door, 
unlocking it.
> SharpClaw: Amuseing, but who do you think your threatening? You saw 
what happend when you tried to attack me a few moments ago.
